snippet: The sports agent Roger Montgomery had only a few clients when he took a chance on an under-the-radar talent, Jeremy Lin.
abstract: Profile of sports agent Roger Montgomery, who had only a few clients when he took a chance on an under-the-radar talent Jeremy Lin, the New York Knicks breakout star point guard.
lead_paragraph: The sports agent Roger Montgomery had only a few clients when he took a chance on an under-the-radar talent, Jeremy Lin.

headline.seo: Jeremy Lin’s Agent, Roger Montgomery, Is Riding High
headline.main: After Backing a Dark Horse, Lin’s Agent Is Riding High
headline.print_headline: Ride of a Lifetime on a Dark Horse
